hotelchain

Class HotelChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelchain.HotelChain

  • public class HotelChain
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class of the HotelChain application. Contains chain and hotel information as well as its guest and registration management systems. int NUMBER_OF_HOTELS, String[] hotelNames and int[] roomsInHotel can be adapted to reflect chain's current situation.
    Author:
    Joost Janssen

      HotelChain(java.lang.String _name)
